articles.author: Ben Church, CNN
articles.title: Naomi Osaka reaches first tennis final since 2021 - CNN
articles.description: Naomi Osaka reached the Miami Open final after beating Belinda Bencic in a comeback win on Thursday.

articles.title: FINAL - Kings 3, Flames 2 (OT) - Arvidsson, Petersen, McLellan - LA Kings Insider
